fighter.name: Fighter
fighter.description: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor

1.name: Fighting Style
1.description: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty.

1.name: Second Wind
1.description: You have a limited well of stamina. Once per short rest, you can use a bonus action to regain 1d10 + fighter level HP.

2.name: Action Surge
2.description: You can push yourself beyond your normal limits. Once per short rest, you can take one additional action on your turn.

3.name: Martial Archetype
3.description: You choose an archetype that represents your martial training and techniques.
